item.title: Hello World
item.description: Shipping is a feature, and because I don’t have much time these days, I’ll start with a minimal viable product and get this homepage published as fast as possible. You’ll find my thoughts and insights here soon. Mostly about technology and software development. But I can’t say how often or when.
